Text:
1. Install A Fresh Copy Of MK9 - Delete Saves, Install etc.

2. Turn on PC, extract the files, click on folder
Mortal Kombat 9 Bosses + Skarlet + Classic Costumes_Mod (Also Plug In Your USB/HDD)

3. Go To "Mortal Kombat 9 Bosses + Skarlet + Classic Costumes_ModBosses Mod"
Folders For Both Regions Are There! Select your reigon and Replace (PS3TOC.TXT)

4. Also Replace The Following Files 
UI_PS_VS_JPEGS_PS3.XXX to(USRDIRASSET)on your USB
UI_PS_VS_PS3_N.XXX to(USRDIRASSET)on your USB
UI_PS_VS_PS3.XXX to(USRDIRASSET)on your USB

5. Go To "Mortal Kombat 9 Bosses + Skarlet + Classic Costumes_ModBosses_ModMK9 1.02 Retail Update" Copy to Root of USB/HDD Stick!

6. Select Your Reigon under "Mortal Kombat 9 Bosses + Skarlet + Classic Costumes_ModCharacter + Costumes Mod"
and copy the "_MK9_Character_+_Costumes_Mod.pkg" and (BL*S)"_MK9_Bosses_Mod_Fix..pkg" Copy to Root of USB/HDD Stick!

7. Install Patches to PS3! Should Work!
